messages.message: Who has ownership/has worked on the scan_box function (i.e. grabbing text from an OCR box)?https://www.instabase.com/Citi_123/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/workspace-anantb/samples/BOL/scripts/get_box_example.py
Starting to productionize it and want to make sure I have all the context, limitations, etc…

And how does this differ from the current `scan_box` function that is currently built into refiner
hAnd
I think @Karthik S was doing some of that for bill of lading

The above link was written by me. I’m currently on PTO. I’ll send you a detailed message once I get access to my laptop. scan_box uses abby’s horizontal and vertical lines and has been there for over an year. Haven’t had luck getting it to work.  The above posted code uses opencv for horizontal and vertical lines and is OCR independent
I believe @Chetan wrote the abbyy-dependent pieces of the other scan_box
